items.title: Highways Have Sliced Through City After City. Can the U.S. Undo the Damage?
items.abstract: The Biden administration is funding projects around the country aimed at reconnecting communities that have been divided by transportation infrastructure.

items.title: White House to Begin $10 Billion Rural Investment Fund
items.abstract: The fund will be managed by Capitol Peak Asset Management and the Agriculture Department will help find projects for it.

items.title: After Years as a Battleground, Investment Boom Lifts Iraqi City
items.abstract: Ramadi was the site of some of the fiercest fighting against U.S. troops during the Iraq war, then came a devastating fight with ISIS. Now, it’s emerging as one of Iraq’s most stable cities.

items.title: U.S. Backs Private Bid for $125 Million for Rural Investment
items.abstract: Two new private investment funds, called Rural Business Investment Companies, are part of a Department of Agriculture program to attract private equity investments in agriculture-related businesses.

items.title: Goldman’s Charitable Foundation Chief to Lead Urban Investment Group
items.abstract: Dina H. Powell will be the new head of a group which specializes in “social impact investing” through projects like the Citi Bike program and an anti-recidivism program for the jail at Rikers Island.
